78.heading: Retailers of Comics.
78.title: Dead But Not Forgotten
78.author: Amber Hunt.
notes: Summary "Barbara and Michael ran a Detroit-area comic book shop, where Renee Kotula was an employee, and Michael's lover. Their torrid affair took a shocking turn when one night Barbara was found dead at the shop, a bullet through her skull. Did Michael kill his wife so that he could collect her life insurance policy, and run off with Renee?" Describes how, eighteen years later, the case was reopened by a new district attorney who found overlooked evidence. Michael was finally arrested, but after a jury found him guilty of murder, the judge overturned his case.
